Text:
Thanks a lot prathaprabhu! 

Can you tell me where i can find an official MD5 checksum, dont wanna to catch a corrupted version :/

Thanks prathaprabhu.

I can confirm that the 32-bit iso is indeed an exact, unmodified version of Windows 7 Professional:

// File Checksum Integrity Verifier version 2.05.

5804.iso"

i want us english version of window7 ultimate,professional 64bit untouched

I can confirm that both .iso files match the SHA-1 hashes available on technet.

Great upload, thanks!
Since it doesn't say VL or OEM, does that mean it's retail? or upgrade?
Oh, and is there a version with SP1 already?

Will this check out with Microsoft?  meaning, can I use windows update, and download things from the microsoft website (microsoft download center) when it says something like... (we need to verify that this is a genuine microsoft product)

Hello, thanks for the upload. The 64 bit sha1 verifies fine, but the sha1 of the 32 bit version (en_windows_7_professional_x86_dvd_x15-65804.iso) in this torrent is

2C7F12D0ED950E4C5FE0160F3E342A488213A7B6

when it should be 
697FA06554502FB21D30275273B25747299C020D
